scripts.bindings:codex: cd apps/codex-functions/src/ && func extensions install && dotnet build extensions.csproj -o bin --no-incremental

scripts.deploy:codex: az functionapp deployment source config-zip -g wrdsb-codex -n wrdsb-codex --src ./dist/codex-functions.zip
scripts.deploy:flenderson: az functionapp deployment source config-zip -g wrdsb-flenderson -n wrdsb-flenderson2 --src ./dist/flenderson-functions.zip
scripts.deploy:hagar: az functionapp deployment source config-zip -g wrdsb-hagar -n wrdsb-hagar --src ./dist/hagar-functions.zip
